text: Kampong Bebuloh is a village in Pengkalan Batu, a mukim in Brunei-Muara District, Brunei. The postcode for Kampong Batu Ampar is BH3323. It is the south-westernmost settlement of the district. == Name == Kampong Bebuloh is derived from the same name in Malay which translates as 'Bebuloh Village'. == References == Bebuloh
title: Kampong Bebuloh
